name: LiquidityPoolManagerV2
description: Contract to distribute SNWM tokens to whitelisted trading pairs. After deploying, whitelist the desired pairs and set the avaxSNWMPair. When initial administration is complete. Ownership should be transferred to the Timelock governance contract.

functionDecorators.name: activateFeeSplit
functionDecorators.description: Activates the fee split mechanism. Divides rewards between AVAX and SNWM pools regardless of liquidity. AVAX and SNWM pools will receive a fixed proportion of the pool rewards. The AVAX and SNWM splits should correspond to percentage of rewards received for each and must add up to 100. For the purposes of fee splitting, the AVAX/SNWM pool is a SNWM pool. This method can also be used to change the split ratio after fee splitting has been activated. Args: avaxSplit: Percent of rewards to distribute to AVAX pools snwmSplit: Percent of rewards to distribute to SNWM pools.

functionDecorators.name: addWhitelistedPool
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new whitelisted liquidity pool pair. Generates a staking contract. Liquidity providers may stake this liquidity provider reward token and claim SNWM rewards proportional to their stake. Pair must contain either AVAX or SNWM. Associates a weight with the pair. Rewards are distributed to the pair proportionally based on its share of the total weight. Args: pair: pair to whitelist weight: how heavily to distribute rewards to this pool relative to other pools.

functionDecorators.name: calculateAndDistribute
functionDecorators.description: Calculate pool token distribution and distribute tokens. Methods are separate to use risk of approaching the gas limit. There must be vested tokens to distribute, so this method should be called after vestAllocation.

functionDecorators.name: calculateReturns
functionDecorators.description: Determine how the vested SNWM allocation will be distributed to the liquidity pool staking contracts. Must be called before distributeTokens(). Tokens are distributed to pools based on relative liquidity proportional to total liquidity. Should be called after vestAllocation()/.

functionDecorators.name: changeWeight
functionDecorators.description: Adjust the weight of an existing pool Args: pair: pool to adjust weight of weight: new weight.

functionDecorators.name: deactivateFeeSplit
functionDecorators.description: Deactivates fee splitting.

functionDecorators.name: distributeTokens
functionDecorators.description: After token distributions have been calculated, actually distribute the vested SNWM allocation to the staking pools. Must be called after calculateReturns().

functionDecorators.name: distributeTokensSinglePool
functionDecorators.description: Fallback for distributeTokens in case of gas overflow. Distributes SNWM tokens to a single pool. distibuteTokens() must still be called once to reset the contract state before calling vestAllocation. Args: pairIndex: index of pair to distribute tokens to, AVAX pairs come first in the ordering.

functionDecorators.name: getAvaxLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of liquidity in the pair. For an AVAX pool, the liquidity in the pair is two times the amount of AVAX. Only works for AVAX pairs. Args: pair: AVAX pair to get liquidity in Returns: the amount of liquidity in the pool in units of AVAX.

functionDecorators.name: getAvaxSnwmRatio
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the price of swapping AVAX for 1 SNWM Returns: the price of swapping AVAX for 1 SNWM.

functionDecorators.name: getPngLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of liquidity in the pair. For a SNWM pool, the liquidity in the pair is two times the amount of SNWM multiplied by the price of AVAX per SNWM. Only works for SNWM pairs. Args: pair: SNWM pair to get liquidity in conversionFactor: the price of AVAX to SNWM Returns: the amount of liquidity in the pool in units of AVAX.

functionDecorators.name: isAvaxPair
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted AVAX pair. The AVAX/SNWM pair is considered an AVAX pair. Args: pair: pair to check Return: True if whitelisted and pair contains AVAX.

functionDecorators.name: isPngPair
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted SNWM pair. The AVAX/SNWM pair is not considered a SNWM pair. Args: pair: pair to check Return: True if whitelisted and pair contains SNWM but is not AVAX/SNWM pair.

functionDecorators.name: isWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted pair Args: pair: pair to check if whitelisted Return: True if whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeWhitelistedPool
functionDecorators.description: Delists a whitelisted pool. Liquidity providers will not receiving future rewards. Already vested funds can still be claimed. Re-whitelisting a delisted pool will deploy a new staking contract. Args: pair: pair to remove from whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setAvaxSnwmPair
functionDecorators.description: Sets the AVAX/SNWM pair. Pair's tokens must be AVAX and SNWM. Args: pair: AVAX/SNWM pair.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: vestAllocation
functionDecorators.description: Claim today's vested tokens for the manager to distribute. Moves tokens from the TreasuryVester to the LiquidityPoolManager. Can only be called if all previously allocated tokens have been distributed. Call distributeTokens() if that is not the case. If any additional SNWM tokens have been transferred to this this contract, they will be marked as unallocated and prepared for distribution.
